html:
1.30.25  11:04 pm   do you use autotune?

      no, but i also don't use any other kind of pitch correction either. i don't expect you to believe me, because everyone uses it and lies about it, but hopefully you can hear just from how bad my pitch is

1.30.25  10:45 pm   why aren't my floppy disks flopping

      because they are not the original floppy kind. the later ones are not floppy at all, they're just named after the actual floppy ones, and even those ones were not that floppy

1.30.25  10:36 pm   thoughts on astronomy and astrophysics?

      has to be done remotely

1.30.25  10:22 pm   Hi bill do you smoke meth?

      no

1.30.25  9:58 pm   I once had a dream you befriended a little orange cat who would come and visit you in the darkness of night. You were always very happy to see your tiny visitor and greatly enjoyed her company whenever she decided to stop by. But it very much had the feeling that she would come and go as she pleased without much consideration for your opinion on the matter. Typical feline. So very fickle. You can never make them behave like a dog despite wishing they would. Which reminds me! Later in that same dream you then had a dog named Vinegar! (The name makes me laugh for multiple reasons) Vinegar seemed to be very loyal and quite affectionate, but she also had a bit of a stubborn streak. You'd try to walk her to where you wanted to go and she would just stop dead in her tracks and refuse to move. "She likes to do this. If I just act like I'm going to leave she'll follow me. She always does." But she just laid there, watching you walk off with your head turned around like an owl watching her in return expectantly. Vinegar never did follow in that dream. Ultimately you had to go back for her with a leash in hand before she got up with a wagging tail to greet you.

      as lovely as this dream may have been, i must inform you that it wasn't about me

1.30.25  9:58 pm   What is the funniest question you've received so far?

      i have never received a funny question

1.30.25  9:42 pm   what would you say is the most important instrument you use in your songs is?

      my voice

1.30.25  8:52 pm   What's a knapsack?

      a backpack

1.30.25  8:32 pm   how is outside?

      huge

1.30.25  8:29 pm   Is music theory real

      i actually don't know what anyone really means by that

1.30.25  8:10 pm   Do you listen to your own music often? like when was the last time you listened to "long long long journey" or "got some money"

      every now and then when i'm feeling confident i'll listen through all of it

1.30.25  6:55 pm   whats ur favorite broadway musical?

      what's the one WITHOUT cats

1.30.25  3:31 pm   psychiatric medication incapacitated my mind. should I still make art?

      yeah

1.30.25  3:25 pm   Have you gone hog wild?

      no but i'd do it if i had to

1.30.25  1:28 pm   What inspires me most about you is how you make intrusive thoughts into words ex. Having Pablo Rectangles for breakfast in your video What is Love...like how we all as kids thought of licking a rectangle lol, reminded me of that. So how does the inspiration for putting such intrusive thoughts into music come from? Do you write down your thoughts as they come? Or some secret mental technique. Anyways love you and your work God bless and have a great day!

      i guess i've just put a lot of work into exercising my imagination

1.30.25  1:20 pm   predictions are hard, especially about the future

      that's probably because the future is always still free to turn out different than it was going to

1.30.25  12:08 pm   Have you ever harmonized your voice in a song?

     of course

     If so, what are some examples?

     just about everything i've ever recorded since 2016. although let me clarify: when we say 'harmonize', in my case this means singing more tracks, vocally, using my own voice. i don't mean 'harmonize' in any kind of auto-technological sense. i sing all the vocals with my own voice, human style. call me old fashioned

1.30.25  12:02 pm   Do you think that we should translate old Germanic names into modern English? Your first name, for example, would become "Wishhelmet".

      i don't believe you

1.30.25  11:06 am   How many r are there in strawberry

      a handful

1.30.25  9:33 am   are you watching the super bowl this weekend? i hope the eagles win

      have they ever won before

1.30.25  9:15 am   why are good decisions so hard to make

      probably because no one can define exactly what a good decision is

1.30.25  8:25 am   minor plagal cadence

      sorry i don't know what those words mean. i'll admit that's my own fault

1.30.25  8:03 am   How do I stop thinking about the fact that everything I see, feel and touch is actually happening within me. Like me typing this right now, the keyboard although in front of me is actually an image within me.

     hopefully you'll start to realize the object permanence at play here

      How do I stop observing my observations? 

     that sounds impossible by definition

1.30.25  3:39 am   how do you count "everything in its right place" by radiohead

      how about like this:   [: 1 2 3 4 1 2 1 2 3 4 :]

1.30.25  1:08 am   how do i reply to your replies

      you can ask another question and let me know exactly which other one you're refering to

1.30.25  1:06 am   thoughts on the great wall of china? is it right or wrong?

      it's ok

1.30.25  12:16 am   i've come to tell you that you are the chosen one. please take this sword and defeat the dark wizard who lurks in the shadow realm

      i'll see what i can do

1.29.25  10:41 pm   how did you get so damn cool? were you born this way or did it take practice

      practice

1.29.25  10:36 pm   what's the best decision you've made about your own music journey?

      to stop feeling guilty about not having a co-author

1.29.25  10:02 pm   i think i forgot how to make good content, can you help

      forgetting is kind of convenient because you can learn it again in a new way. for people who just 'remember' how to make good things, sometimes it gets boring because they do it too much the same as they did before

1.29.25  9:48 pm   thoughts on the longevity of life?

      it's kind of a miracle

1.29.25  9:09 pm   what do you do when you feel worthless and everything that you've ever acomplished in life was not done by you tryign to do stuff but because of luck and you feel like that what you have in life, another person would be better, and you dont even know how people like you, so you feel sad?

      just wait it out

1.29.25  9:02 pm   will the atlanta hawks win something

      eventually

1.29.25  7:33 pm   have you ever thought of what the word "thought" looks like in your thoughts?

     probably at some point, yes

     Are thoughts thoughtful?

     by definition, yes

      Could I pay you one circular copper U.S. currency whose value amounts to one cent in exchange for your speculative imaginated mental constructs?

     i don't know if that's going to work

1.29.25  7:07 pm   Do you like wildlife documentaries?

      maybe some of them

1.29.25  7:05 pm   Who is your creative inspiration? Any specific work that resonated with you? 

      you never know who or when it's going to be

1.29.25  5:30 pm   how many times a day do you press the letter 'T' on your keyboard?

      about 100

1.29.25  5:28 pm   on a scale of 12 to 91, how cool are saturdays

      52

1.29.25  5:02 pm   Do you ever think about

      yes i do

1.29.25  4:17 pm   is "if the world doesn't end" about the covid pandemic?

      i never thought of it that way, but there's no reason it can't be

1.29.25  3:56 pm   what is the next prime quadruplet after the 190s?

      the 820s

1.29.25  3:29 pm   How do you identify a problem when there is one but you don't know what it is?

     how about playing "what do we know"

1.29.25  2:46 pm   how do you explain music?  are music teachers real and what should they do?  hope you're having a great existence.

      i can't explain it. i don't know how anyone else could either, but maybe someone can

1.29.25  2:20 pm   Opinion on red heads

      out of all the things that people think might sound like a racial slur, i must admit, that one really really really sounds like a racial slur. correct me if i'm wrong

1.29.25  1:50 pm   what genre would you say many your songs are? Im bad at categorizing stuff into genres the boundaries always end up blurry 

      i'm useless here, i'm worse than you at it. you at least have assumed that there probably are supposed to be boundaries

1.29.25  1:08 pm   i'm trying to write a story, which is set in a normal world like this one, where a lot of humanity is gone in some way, but i don't know how to start it. do you have any ideas i could take into use?

      how about starting out by reminding people to subscribe to your stories and make sure they like it before they've read it

1.29.25  1:04 pm   thoughts about Tiberius Gracchus?

      never heard of him

1.29.25  10:53 am   your skills at "blurring the supposed unwritten fine line between SILLY and SERIOUS" is extremely inspirational for me

      that's nice of you to say, but of course my dirty secret is that there is no line. as the years go by i just get increasingly confused when i am reminded that other people think there is supposed to be a line. on second thought maybe i'm way off base

1.29.25  10:49 am   It seems that I learn stuff way better when I try to teach them to someone  else, and I actually  enjoy helping others understand. How about you?

     yes, i think this is a common phenomenon and i often recommend this as a learning method

     The problem with this that I need people that need my knowledge  on the subject, and they have to be like friends of mine, I get too nervous with strangers in fear of saying dumb shit

1.29.25  10:47 am   the tritone is like the pickle of music.

      was that before or after the apple came along and unwittingly changed the definition of a tritone
